definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product

sentences.english: More revealing still, the shipments were insured by Chiang's government banks.
sentences.chinese: 更妙的是，船上装的货都在蒋的政府银行保了险。

sentences.english: You want to have your goods shipped from Swatow to Osaka via HongKong, where they can be transshipped .
sentences.chinese: 你想通过香港把货从汕头运到大阪，在香港转船。

sentences.english: A: We need our order separated into three different boxes .
sentences.chinese: 我们订的货需要分装三箱。

sentences.english: To solve these problems, I would like to return the printer and get a refund.
sentences.chinese: 为了解决这些问题，我打算把货退还并要求退钱。

sentences.english: The vendor can turn his stock every day.
sentences.chinese: 小贩每天都能把进的货卖完。

sentences.english: The store is closing out tomorrow; I'll go and buy a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 商店明天有廉价货销售，我去买双鞋。

sentences.english: Fire is good merchandise, credit is a collective, once pressed the library, pay out compensation.
sentences.chinese: 火了是好货，功劳属集体，一旦压了库，工资往外赔。

sentences.english: Pop big buckle, we had many wood look colorway for choice or make your own color.
sentences.chinese: 特大皮带扣，有多种木纹可供选购，亦可跟来色做货。

sentences.english: Which lager can claim to be truly German? This can.
sentences.chinese: 哪种大罐啤酒可称得上是地道的德国货？这罐。

sentences.english: And we also have the possibility of offering the services of a supply vessel.
sentences.chinese: 拼箱货船货转运以及供应船的服务。

sentences.english: I'm interested in an iron cross second class . an original.
sentences.chinese: 我对这个铁十字感兴趣，二流货，原物。

sentences.english: The shop make a mistake and send the wrong item.
sentences.chinese: 商店出了差错而送错了货。

sentences.english: It is required for surveyor to check draft after completion of first batch of cargo.
sentences.chinese: 第一票货完工后需要商检看水尺，请做好准备。

sentences.english: Some of the clothes I like best are hand-me-downs.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的一些衣服是传下来的廉价货。

sentences.english: How to interpret the perspective of chinese commodities?
sentences.chinese: 怎样来看中国货的前途？

sentences.english: I got to get this truck unloaded and on the way back to the ware house before dark.
sentences.chinese: 我得把这车货卸完，在天黑前赶回仓库去呐。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to order goods/to place an order
to put together an order of goods
